Hari abantu benshi bakora siporo bakeneye kugabanya ibiro, nyamara aho kugabanuka bikiyongera cyangwa se bigahama aho biri.
Corinne Peirano, ni impuguke mu by’imirire na siporo wasobanuriye byinshi urubuga rwa e-santé.fr.
imwe mu mpamvu zikomeye zituma abantu bakora siporo ni ukugira ngo bate ibiro. Kugira ngo umuntu afate umurongo mwiza, siporo iba igomba kujyana n’indyo yabugenewe.
Gusa akenshi n’ubwo benshi bamara umwanya mu nzu zikorerwamo siporo abandi bakiruka ahantu harehare, usanga ibiro
... 
 igihe umuntu akora siporo ntananuke kubera ko afite ibiro bikwiye, akurikije indeshyo n’imyaka ye.
Iyo Ibipimo by’ubuzima n’umubyibuho nta kibazo bigaragaza, umuntu akaba afata indyo iboneye kandi iringaniye, siporo ntizamufasha guta ibiro, kuko bikomeje kugabanuka yagwa mu bindi bibazo by’ubuzima.
Gusa Corinne avuga ko mu gihe umuntu yageze ku biro nyabyo, aba agomba gukomeza gukora siporo kuko ifasha kugumana ubuzima bwiza muri rusange.
Ikibazo mu misemburo
Hari abantu bakora siporo mu buryo 
...
inama ko mu gihe umuntu yiyemeje gukora siporo agamije kunanuka, agomba no kwita ku bisabwa cyane cyane imirire iboneye, ijyanye nyine na siporo.
Bimwe mu biribwa umuntu ukora siporo agamije gutakaza ibiro yakwibandaho, harimo ibikomoka mu mazi (amafi, n’ibindi), ibinyamavuta (ubunyobwa, ibihwagari n,ibindi) ndetse n’ibirimo vitamin C na E.
Ikindi ni ukugabanya ibiribwa byongera ibinure mu mubiri, fromage, ibiribwa bikoze mu ifarini, inyama zokeje, ifiriti n’ibiribwa byo mu nganda.

PASSION:Ishyaka nimbaraga zingenzi zo gutwara kugirango akazi gakorwe, kandi nigiciro cyibanze.Komeza ishyaka ryumwuga ninganda, bidusaba gufata buri kantu kose kakazi hamwe nimyumvire myiza, kandi twishimiye kwakira ibibazo byose.
AMABANGA:Umubano wigihe kirekire nabakiriya ushingiye ku kwizerana no kubahana.Mugihe tugera kumurongo wamakuru hamwe nabakiriya, dufatana uburemere ipatanti yabakiriya, ubuzima bwite.
Imbaraga zacu:Kumenya "Umwihariko" bituma dukomeza kwitangira gushimangira inyungu murwego rwacu, turimo tunonosora burimunsi kugirango tube urubuga rumwe rwo gutanga amasoko rimwe mubabyeyi no kubyara kubakiriya bacu.
Umwuka w'itsinda:Dufite amakipe menshi kuva Igishushanyo, gukora, kugenzura ubuziranenge no kugurisha.Bose barakorana cyane.Hejuru yibyo, dukorana cyane nabakiriya bacu, dutezimbere hamwe, dutere imbere hamwe.
Gufungura:Imyitwarire yacu y'akazi ni ukumva, kwiga no kunoza.Komeza ufungure ibitekerezo kumasoko nabakiriya.

Ibicuruzwa byiza byo mu gikapu Umuyoboro wimyanda yimbwa Yimbwa Yimbwa Yumukiriya Imyanda Yimyanda Yimyanda Biodegradable.
Isakoshi 100% yangirika kandi ifumbire mvaruganda ikozwe mubigori hamwe na PBAT. Umufuka wo gutoragura ibikapu ni ngombwa-kugira abantu beza bagendagenda imbwa, byoroshye kandi bifatika byo gutoragura amatungo. Iyo imbwa isohotse, irashobora kuyikoresha mu gufata pisine. Isukuye kandi yoroshye, ntabwo izanduza amaboko ya nyirayo, kandi irinde kwanduza ibidukikije. Nibigaragaza kubana kwimico nimico.
Ibikapu byangirika byuzuye birashobora gukoreshwa muri parike, inzira, ubusitani nahandi hantu imbwa zigenda zidatinze. Imbwa imaze gusohoka, fata igikapu uyitoragure utanduye amaboko.
1. Ifumbire mvaruganda yibinyabuzima: ibinyamisogwe by'ibigori na PBAT.
2. Igikorwa cyiza cyo gushiraho ikimenyetso: Ibicuruzwa birinda amazi kandi bikingira impumuro.
3. Imiterere: byoroshye kandi byiza, urwego-rwa mbere rwumva.
4. Amavuta adashobora gukoreshwa n'amazi: bikozwe mu bimera, ubuso ntibuzoroha.
5. Igishushanyo mbonera: byoroshye kubigeraho, gusa ubikureho.
6. OEM / ODM / Yashizweho:Ingano yihariye, ibara, igishushanyo, paki, agasanduku ko hanze.

Izo nyigisho zivuga impuha zitagize aho zihuriye n’inzira y’umukiro, zishobora kuba ubushukanyi umuntu ashobora kukugerageresha. Mugisha Emmanuel Clapton, umunyarwenya umaze kwamamara mu Rwanda aho benshi bamuzi nka Kibonke, yibarutse umwana w’umukobwa mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 13 Ukuboza 2018, itariki avuga ko isobanuye byinshi kuko we yavutse tariki 14. Mu rwenya rwinshi, ashimangira ko umwana yabyaye azaba Miss Rwanda, ariko akagaragaza ko yababajwe cyane n’abagenda bavuga ko yabyariye amezi abiri kandi ngo ibyo ntaho bihuriye.
Kibonke wari umaze igihe gito asezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umugore we, babyariye mu bitaro bya Kacyiru, umwana na nyina bakaba bameze neza. Uyu munyarwenya avuga ko nyuma yo gusezerana n’umugore we atwite abantu bagiye bavuga ibintu byinshi bitandukanye, n’ubu bamwe bakaba batangiye kuvuga ko abyariye amezi abiri.
Kibonke avuga ko kuba abyaye hashize amezi abiri asezeranye ntaho bihuriye no kubyarira amezi abiri kuko binashoboka ko yari gusezerana nyuma yo kubyara. Avuga kandi ko abenshi bavuga ibyo ari abatarashaka bagihindaguranya abakunzi, kuko ngo umuntu mukuru wubatse adashobora gutinyuka kuvuga ngo Kibonke yabyariye amezi abiri.
Kibonke wasubizaga umunyamakuru akavangamo amagambo atandukanye y’urwenya, yanashimangiye ko ubu yiyumva nk’umuntu udasanzwe kuko kwitwa umubyeyi ari ibintu yumva aha agaciro gahambaye cyane mu buzima bwe, akumva ko bizanamwongerera imbaraga mu kazi ka buri munsi asanzwe akora.

uri Youth Invasion Crusade (YIC) n’intego yayo
Youth Invasion Crusade (YIC) ni igiterane cyo kwegukana imitima y’urubyiruko. Ijambo Invasion ubwaryo risobanura ‘Igikorwa cyokwegukana’; Uku kwegukana kwakoreshejwe muri YIC, bijyanye no kwegukana imitima y’abo bahuranabo, nk’ukoi ngabozegukana abanzi bazo, niko byose babyegurira Imana kugirango ibegukane n’icyubahiro cyayo, ineza yayo igatuma abantu biyegurira Imana burundu .Ijambo Crusade ryo risobanura igiterane cy’imbaraga gihuza abantu benshi.

Abanyeshuri biga muri iri shuri bishimiye kwigira mu mashuri agezweho bubakiwe na RDB
Kuri uyu wa 19 Kanama 2016, ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere (RDB) cyatashye kinafungura ku mugaragaro ibyumba birindwi by’amashuri yubatswe mu ishuri ribanza rya Kanyove muri gahunda yo gukoresha umugabane umwe w’amafaranga aturuka ku bukerarugendo mu guteza imbere ibikorwa remezo.
Ibi byumba by’amashuri byatashywe byumatse mu ishuri ribanza rya Kanyove riherereye mu mudugudu wa Kamiro, akagari ka Gasizi,
... 
ari urugero wriza rw’ibyo umunyarwanda yageraho aramutse afashe neza pariki.
Ati: “iyi ntambwe duteye ni urugero rwiza rw’ibyo abaturage bageraho mu gihe bafashe neza pariki zituzanira abakerarugendo na bo bakatuzanira amadevise bigatuma twigira, pariki ni ikirezi abanyarwanda bazi ko cyera kuko bazibungabunga kandi na zo zikabagirira akamaro”
Kaliza Belise ushinzwe ubukerarugendo muri RDB we yavuze ko ayo mashuri RDB yubatse ari ubutumwa bukomeye ku babyeyi. Ati: “ gufasha aba bana basaga 1200 
...
 mbere bigiraga mu ivumbi no mu byumba byashaje ariko ubu ngo bishimiye iterambere bagejejweho na RDB. gusa kuri ubu, Makuza avuga ko ngo hakiri ibindi byumba umunani bishaje akaba asaba ko na byo bisimbujwe ibishyashya byarushaho kuba byiza.
RDB iri gukora ibi bikorwa mu gihe U Rwanda ruritegura igikorwa cyo kwita amazina abana b’ingagi giteganyijwe kuba kuw 02 Nzeri 2016 nka kimwe mu bikorwa byo guteza imbere ubukerarugendo. Kuri uyu munsi hazitwa amazina abana 21 b’ingagi bavutse.

Ibiti 26% by’ikawa mu Rwanda birengeje imyaka 30
Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (MINICOM) Prof Ngabitsinze Jean Chrysostome, yahishuye ko kugeza ubu mu Rwanda habarurwa ibiti by’ikawa bishaje bituma umusaruro utiyongera uko bikwiye, aho 26% byabyo birengeje imyaka 30.
Yabigarutseho ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 20 Gashyantare 2024, atanga ibisabonuro ku bibazo Abadepite bari bagaragarije Minisiteri ko hari abahinzi b’ikawa mu Rwanda batabona ifumbire mu buryo bukwiye bigatuma umusaruro uhagije utabon
... 
e munini w’ababikoramo (abahinzi) na bo barakuze.
Yavuze ko imibare igaraza ko 40% by’ibiti by’ikawa y’u Rwanda byitabwaho n’abafite hejuru y’imyaka 60 y’amavuko.
Uwo Muyobozi yavuze ko gusazura ibiti by’ikawa byaganiriweho n’inzego bireba muri Guverinoma, bityo bikaba ari byo birimo kwihutishwa kugira ngo bikorwe, hanyuma harebwe uko ifumbire itangwa yajya itanga umusaruro uhagije.
Minisitiri Prof. Ngabitsinze yahamirije intumwa za rubanda ko ubusanzwe ifumbire y’ikawa ishyirirwaho Nkunganire n
...
a kujya mu buhinzi bw’ikawa kuko ari byo bizatanga umusaruro kurushaho.
Yagize ati: “Tunasura aba bahinzi b’ikawa usanga biganjemo abantu bakuze, ugeraranyije n’akamaro ikawa idufitiye n’amadovize yinjiza, n’ukuntu ikawa y’u Rwanda ikunzwe. Badufashe igiteganywa gukorwa gikorwe kugira ngo rwa rubyiruko rwaba urwize ndetse n’abatarize bashishikarizwe kujya muri iki gikorwa cyo guhinga ikawa.”
Yashimangiye ko bizanatuma inganda zitunganya ikawa ziyongera ndetse na zo zikazaba zifitwe n’urubyiruko.

Abasore babiri bo mu Karere ka Gatsibo mu Murenge wa Rwimbogo bazengurukijwe agasantere kose bazitwaye ku bitugu no mu ijosi ihene kuri buri umwe ndetse banahetse icyuma gitanga ingufu z’imirasire y’izuba nyuma yo kubifatanwa babyibye.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 12 mu Murenge wa Rwimbogo, abasore batandatu bagiye mu Kagari ka Karenge mu Murenge wa Kabarore, bibayo ihene enye ebyiri barazica izindi barazigurisha.
Nyuma bahise berekeza mu Kagari ka Nyamatete k’Umurenge Sacco wa Rwikiniro naho bahiba i
... 
bibye.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Nyamatete, Rudacogora Ferdinand, yavuze ko kubatembereza mu muhanda bazitwaye ku bitugu no mu ijosi ibyo bibye, ari ukugira ngo bibere isomo n’abandi.
Ati “Amakuru mfite ni uko bari bibye ihene enye mu Kagari ka Karenge, ebyiri bahita bazica biba n’imirasire ibiri kuri Sacco ya Rwikiniro. Kubafata tukabatembereza kwari ukugira ngo nibura n’abandi bafite uwo mutima babibone bamenye ko amazi atakiri ya yandi kuko byari bimaze iminsi bikorwa, hari a
...
myaka 16 na 23 rudakora ari nabo benshi bagaragara mu bujura.

Yanditswe na Kayitare Jean Paul
Abaturage b’Umurenge wa Kinyinya mu karere ka Gasabo mu mujyi wa Kigali barimo n’abakora umwuga w’irondo ry’umwuga, basuye urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwa Bisesero mu karere ka Karongi mu ntara y’Iburengerazuba.
Umuyobozi w’Umurenge wa Kinyinya, Umuhoza Rwabukumba, yasabye abanyerondo gukangurira bagenzi babo batabashije kugera ku rwibutso kwirinda amacakubiri n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jeno
... 
gabunga umutekano w’abo mushinzwe kurinda ariko mugaca ukubiri n’amacakubiri n’ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose”.
Umwe mu baturage wasuye urwibutso yavuze ibyo yabonye ku rwibutso ndetse n’ibyo basobanuriwe. Ati: “Nasobanuriwe ko amacumu ikenda batweretse, ashushanya amakomini 9 yari agize perefegitura ya Kibuye”.
Akomeza avuga ko yabonye inzu 3, buri nzu ikaba ifite ibyumba 3 byose bikaba ibyumba 9. Avuga ko babwiwe ko izo nzu zigenda zirutana nk’uko amakomini 9 yarutanaga, bigashushanya uko abatuts
...
kavuga ko azakora uko ashoboye na we akagira uruhare mu kurwanya icyatuma hongera kubaho Jenoside.
Abanyabisesero bagaragaje ubutwari budasanzwe mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, akaba ari na yo mpamvu yatumye aba baturage bajya gusura uru rwibutso kuko bibafasha kwibuka banigira ku mateka. Abanyabisesero barwanyije interahamwe n’abasirikare bitabaza amacumu n’amabuye ariko biranga biba iby’ubusa kuko batari kubona imbaraga zagombaga guhashya umwanzi wari ufite imbunda n’ibitwaro bikomeye.

Ikibababaza kurushaho ngo ni uko ubwo butaka mbere bwari ubw’abakurambere babo, umutware Sehene yahabwa kubayobora mu myaka ya 1930 akabubirukanamo, nk’uko bisobanurwa na Hitimana, umwe mu batuye kuri uyu musozi.
Agira ati “Muri 2010 ni bwo Rwabutanga na Ntaganda bavuga ko bakomoka kuri Sehene baje ngo tugabane ubutaka, tubyanze baturega mu bunzi. Icyo gihe twaratsinze kuko bababajije ibisekuru bagasanga nta gisekuru bagira ino, basanga nta n’uwo bafitanye isano wigeze atura ino”.

Ni n’uko benshi babona ko kuva u Rwanda rwabaho kugeza muri 1959, ubutegetsi bwari ubw’Abatutsi. Hagati ya 1959 na 1994, bakabona bwari ubw’Abahutu. Kuva muri 94 kugeza u
... 
tu b’ « ibyitso » byabo.

Ni abayobozi buzuye, bafite uburenganzira bungana n’ubw’undi wese muri ANC. Ntabwo ANC ari umutwe w’Abirabura. Ni umutwe wa politiki w’Abanyafrika y’Epfo bose baharanira icyo bise “National Democratic Revolution”.
Uyu murongo ni wo wonyine ushobora gutuma ikibazo cy’amoko gikemuka burundu mu gihugu cyacu. Ni wo FDU-INKINGI yahisemo. Icyo muri FDU-INKINGI dushaka ni demokarasi. Ni ukuvuga ngo uzana ikindi kitari demokarasi n’uburenganzira bungana turamurwanya, yaba ari Umuhutu, yaba ari Umututsi.

Ku bijyanye n'ubukorikori, buri muhanzi akenera ibikoresho bibiri by'ibanze: aipine yamapinena scraper.Ibi bikoresho byombi bikorana bidasubirwaho kugirango bigufashe gukora ibihangano byiza kandi bidasanzwe.Ku rundi ruhande, Spatulas, nintwari zitavuzwe mubukorikori.Ibi bikoresho nibyingenzi mugukuraho ibikoresho birenze mumishinga yawe no kugira aho ukorera hasukuye kandi hasukuye.Waba ukuraho impapuro zirenze kurupapuro rwibitabo cyangwa gutema impande zuburiri, ibisakuzo nigice cyingenzi cyibikoresho byabashushanyo.Ariko niki gituma stapler na scraper bihuza neza?Igisubizo kiroroshye: bakorera hamwe kugirango bagufashe kugera kuntego zawe.Imashini idoda igufasha gukora ibishushanyo bitangaje, mugihe imashini isakara yemeza ko buri kantu kose keza.Ntabwo ibiranga ibi bikoresho gusa bituma biba byiza.Stapler na scraper nazo zirahinduka cyane kandi zuzuye kubikorwa bitandukanye byubukorikori.Kuva kudoda no gutaka kugeza kubitabo no gukora amakarita, nta karimbi kubyo ushobora gukora hamwe nibikoresho.Tire marikenigikoresho cyingenzi kubikorwa byose byo gufata amapine.Mugushira akamenyetso kuri buri tine hamwe nibisabwa byihariye hamwe nu mwanya uri ku kinyabiziga, urashobora kumenya vuba kandi byoroshye kumenya amapine akeneye kwitabwaho, kuzunguruka kugirango yambare, kandi ukurikirane ibyasanwe nabasimbuye.Noneho, waba uri umukanishi wabigize umwuga cyangwa ukunda imodoka isanzwe, menya kongeramo ipine iranga crayon mubitabo byawe uyumunsi.

Ibiryo byongera ibiryo biha ubushakashatsi no gutanga umusaruro wa betaine yose, ikubiyemo imiti yo mu rwego rwo hejuru y’imiti n’ibir
... 
, ifite imbaraga za tekiniki, kandi ifite itsinda ryubushakashatsi ryigenga hamwe na R&D Centre muri kaminuza ya Jinan.Dufite ubufatanye bwimbitse na kaminuza ya Jinan, kaminuza ya Shandong, Ishuri Rikuru ry'Ubushinwa n'izindi kaminuza.
Dufite ubushobozi bukomeye bwa R&D hamwe nubushobozi bwo gukora ibicuruzwa, kandi tunatanga ibicuruzwa byubuhanga buhanitse no guhererekanya ikoranabuhanga.
Isosiyete yacu yibanda kubicuruzwa byiza kandi ifite igenzura rikomeye mugihe cyo gukora.Uruganda rwanyuze
...
sinda manini manini, byatsindiye kandi abakiriya n’ubufatanye burambye.
60% by'ibicuruzwa byacu byoherezwa mu Buyapani, Koreya, Burezili, Mexico, Ubuholandi, Amerika, Ubudage, Aziya y'Amajyepfo y'Uburasirazuba, n'ibindi kandi byakira ishimwe ryinshi ku bakiriya bo mu gihugu ndetse no mu mahanga.
Inshingano yisosiyete yacu: Shimangira imiyoborere yo mucyiciro cya mbere, utange ibicuruzwa byo mu rwego rwa mbere, utange serivisi zo mu rwego rwa mbere, kandi wubake imishinga yo mu cyiciro cya mbere.

Evode Uwizeyimana

1) Kuzunguruka inshuro ebyiri gukonjesha, nkigikoresho cyoroshye cyo guhindura imodoka.
)
3) Gantry-ingendo, ikomeye, yizewe kandi ihamye, idahinduka, ahantu nyaburanga.
4) Y axis ikoresha servo / intambwe ya moteri, hitamo guhuza kugirango umenye neza kugenda neza.
5) Sisitemu yo kugenzura DSP, hamwe na U disiki iraboneka kandi idakeneye mudasobwa (irashobora kuba itari kumurongo rwose.), Itanga ubwigenge buhanitse kandi bworoshye kubikorwa.
6) Ubushobozi budasanzwe bwo kubika ingingo nyinshi zinkomoko kubikorwa byinshi.
)
8) Imodoka ishakisha ingingo yumwimerere, inzira nziza yo kunoza imikorere.
9) Ihuza rinini rya software ishushanya, nka Type3, artcam nizindi CAD cyangwa CAM.
10) Imbonerahamwe ya Vacuum irashobora gushyigikira ibikoresho byubunini butandukanye neza.
* Ibikoresho: inzugi zimbaho, akabati, isahani, biro nibikoresho byo mubiti, ameza, intebe, inzugi nidirishya.
* Ibicuruzwa byimbaho: agasanduku k'ijwi, akabati k'imikino, ameza ya mudasobwa, ameza yo kudoda, ibikoresho.
* Gutunganya amasahani: igice cyo kubika, ibikoresho bya plasitiki, PCB, umubiri wimbere wimodoka, inzira yo gukubita, ingazi, ikibaho kirwanya Bate, epoxy resin, ABS, PP, PE, PEHD nibindi bivangavanze bya karubone.
* Kurimbisha inganda: Acrylic, PVC, MDF, ibuye ryubukorikori, ikirahuri kama, plastike nicyuma cyoroshye nkumuringa, gushushanya plaque ya aluminium no gusya.

Mu karere ka Rwamanagana mu murenge wa Mwuriri ni hamwe mu duce twagenewe inganda nkuko biteganijwe mu muterere umunani dufite imigi yunganira Kigali bakaba bafite inganda zitandukanye arizo urukora ibyuma (fer à béton) rumaze kwandika izina ku isoko ry’ubwubatsi mu Rwanda, urukora ibigega, urukora ibiryo by’amatungo n’izindi zikomeje kuhasesekara amanywa n’ijoro.
Urubyiruko rwo mu Karere ka Rwamagana ruhamya ko iki gice cyahariwe inganda bakibonamo amahirwe akomeye yo kubaha akazi bagasezerera ubushomeri. Ku ikubitiro bamwe muri uru rubyiruko batangiye kubona akazi mu mirimo y’ubwubatsi bw’inganda abandi barahugurwa kugira ngo bazahabwe akazi mu gihe zizaba zitangiye.
Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Rwamagana, Mbonyumuvunyi Radjab, yabwiye ikinyamakuru igihe dukesha iyi nkuru ko asanga izi nganda ari amahirwe akomeye ku rubyiruko kuko zizaha abarenga ibihumbi 2000 akazi.
Akarere ka Rwamagana gatangaza ko nibura mu 2021, igice cyahariwe inganda muri aka karere kizaba gikorerwamo n’inganda zose ziteganyijwe. Zirimo izikora ibituruka mu buhinzi n’ubutabire, ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi, izizakora ibiryo by’amatungo, inzoga ndetse nizizakora imyenda.

Ayo mateka yagiye afasha Abanyarwanda kugira ibyo bubaha n’ibyo batinya. Muri iyi nkuru tugiye kubatekerereza iteka ryaciwe n’umwami Mibambwe III Sentabyo, watwaye u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1741 kugeza mu wa 1846, rikaba kimomo mu Rwanda hose.
Abahondogo bari ubwoko bw’ibikomangoma by’i Bugesera; ni bo bavagamo abami babwo kera butaraba ubw’u Rwanda. Umwami w’i Bugesera uwo ari we wese wimye bamwitaga Nsoro, nk’uko mu Gisaka bamwitaga Kimenyi, mu Nkore bakamwita Gahaya.
Rimwe rero, Nsoro umwami w’i
... 
horo ngo bahumanuke.
Bukeye ku gasusuruko Mabwire araza yihaze abwira abarinzi bo kwa Sentabyo ati “Ntimurebe Mabwire wo mu ngabo za Nsoro zatsinzwe, kuko nikoreye ubutumwa bw’Abahondogo bose bagize ingoma y’u Bugesera bifuza kuyoboka. None rero ubutumwa buruta intumwa, nimunshyikirize umwami mushyikirize ubutumwa nahawe n’umuryango mugari w’Abahondogo”.
Abagaragu ba Sentabyo batangazwa n’iryo jambo ababwiye, baragenda barigeza kwa Sentabyo. Nuko ategeka ko bamuzanira Mabwire amushyikiriza ubwo 
...
ibitekerezo k’umwami Mibambwe Sentabyo akibuka ubutumwa Mabwire yamushyikirije bwatumye atabara Abahondogo bari bishwe n’inzara bigatuma banayoboka nta mananiza, amaze no kwibuka ubutumwa yahawe n’intumwa ye yatumye mu Bugesera ngo iherekeze Mabwire, ikazana inkuru nziza y’Abahondogo bayobotse kandi ko bahonotse inzara yari ibajengereje. Yumva intumwa ntacyo yayinganya iyo isohoje ubutumwa. Nuko ku ngoma ye aca iteka rikwira u Rwanda rwose rigira riti “Ubutumwa buruta intumwa”.

Umuhanzi w’umunyarwanda Alpha Rwirangira wari umaze iminsi muri Amerika aho ari gukomereza amasomo ye yagarutse mu Rwanda ,ndetse kuri uyu wa mbere akaba yarifatanije n’abana barwariye muri CHUK mu rwego rwo gusangira nabo Noheli.
Apha Rwirangira wamenyekanye muri Tusker Project Fame irushanwa ribera muri Kenya biza kumuviramo nawe gutangira urwego rwe rwa muzika .nyuma y’iminsi mike amaze agarutse mu Rwanda yifuje Gusangira noheli n’abana barwariye Mu bitaro bya CHUK aherekejwe n’inshuti ze za hafi.
Uretse ibyo Alpha yari yitwaje nk’impano harimo isukari,amata,amasabune,amavuta n’ibindi ,Alpha yagaragaje umutima w’impuhwe kuri aba bana barwaye dore ko hari nabo yafashije kugura imiti .
Aya ni AMwe mu mafoto agaragaza uko igikorwa cyagenze.

Isinzi ry’abantu batandukanye biganjemo abakomoka mu idini ry’abagatulika nabo muri Evangelique bakoze imyigaragambyo yo kwamagana ishyingiranwa ry’abatinganyi mu gihugu cya Repubulika ya Equateur.
Ikinyamakuru cya Evangeliques.info gitangaza ko byabaye kuri uyu wa gatandatu ushize taliki ya 29 Kamena 2019,aho abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bigaragambirizaga umwanzuro w’urukiko rushinzwe kurinda itegekonshinga wemerera abatinganyi gushyingirwa byemewe n’amategeko.
Hagati y’ibihumbi 5000 na 15000 bazengurutse mu mihanda ya Quito bavuga bati:”harakabaho ubuzima,harakabaho urukundo,harakabaho ugushyingiranwa kwagenwe n’Imana”.Gusa kandi bari bitwaje n’amapankarita yanditseho ngo”Icyubahiro Yego,ishyingiranwa ry’abatinganyi Oya”.
Izindi ngendo nkizo zamagana abashyingiranwa bahuje ibitsina zabereye mu mijyi ya Quevedo,Cuenca,Latacunga na Ambato nkuko Ikinyamakuru cya Liberation kibitangaza.
Taliki ya 12 Kamena nibwo abacamanza b’urukiko rurinda itegeko nshinga bemeje ishyingiranwa ry’abatinganyi mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko ku majwi atanu kuri ane.Muri Amerika y’amajyepfo Algentine,Bresil,Colombiya na Urguay ho ubutinganyi bwemewe n’amategeko.

... 
shye, gusangira ibyuma, ibyuma bishyushye byicyuma cyimodoka inyuma-impeta, ibyuma bishyushye byicyuma byerekana ibyapa, ibyuma bishyushye byicyuma kubiziga byimodoka, gari ya moshi, umupira ibyuma bisobekeranye byo kubaka ubwato, ibyuma bifata ibyuma, ibyuma bisakara nibindi.

Informal sector burya ifite uruhare mu guteza imbere igihugu n’abaturage bacyo, ibyo gucururiza ku mihanda rero igihe biri well oganized no kunyonga amagare ku buryo buri organized byakagombye kwinjira muri informal sector, bigafatwa nk’umwuga wemewe mu gihugu kandi ufasha uwukora kwibeshaho mu buryo bwemewe atandavuye cyangwa ngo yibe.

Abakambwe babiri bafite umwihariko w’uko aribo mpanga zikuze ku isi baherutse gusangira umuvinyo bishimira imyaka irenga gato ku kinyejana bamaze ku isi.
Aba bagabo bakomoka mu gihugu cy’u Bubiligi bakaba baherutse kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 103 y’ubukure bamaze ku isi muri iyo myaka iruta ikinyejana bakaba barayimaze babana cyane ko nta n’uwigeze agira igitekerezo cyo gushaka umugore.
Izi mpanga zikaba zituye mu ntara ya East Flanders mu gace ka Ghent aho zimaze imyaka zibanira mu nzu imwe basangira burikintu cyose.
Gusa izi mpanga ngo iyo zishubije amaso inyuma zicuza kuba nta mwana cyangwa umwizukuru bagira ariko ngo bagahumurizwa no n’umubano wa ntamakemwa bafitanye.
Paul na Pierre bihije imyaka 103 bakiri ingaragu
Ahagana mu kinyejana cya 20 izi mpanga zivuga ko zakoraga umwuga w’ubucamanza mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa aho zaje kwishimira cyane ururimi rw’igifaransa nyuma bakaza no guhindura amazina y’abo maze uwitwaga Paulus akitwa Paul hanyuma uwitwaga Pieter Langrock we akaza kwiyita Pierre.
Izi mpanga zikaba zibura imyaka ibiri gusa ngo zikureho agahigo kabazibanjirije bakomokaga muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika arizo Glen na Dale Moyer bagize imyaka isaga 105 bagihumeka umwuka wabazima.

Kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki ya 01/09/2015 mu kigo gitorezwamo umuco w’Ubutore cya Nkumba, hatangijwe Itorero Intagamburuzwa icyicaro cya kabiri kigizwe n’abayobozi b’abanyeshuri baturutse mu mashuri makuru na za Kaminuza zose zikorera mu Rwanda.
Mu Ijambo Prezida wa Komisiyo Y’Igihugu y’Itorero Bwana RUCAGU Boniface yagejeje kuri izi ntore z’Intagamburuzwa, yabanje kufuriza ikaze mu kigo gitorezwamo umuco w’Ubutore cya Nkumba, ababwira ko ari ahantu heza cyane kandi hatuje hatuma umuntu yitonda ag
... 
a kuba koko ba Nkore neza bandebereho mu muryango nyarwanda kugira ngo uzababona wese azababonemo umuco mwiza n’imigirire myiza iranga Abanyarwanda. Ati” Muzabe koko imboni z’Itorero mudufasha kwimakaza umuco w’Ubutore mu mashuri makuru na Kaminuza”.
Yabasabye kandi gufasha mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda y’Urugerero mu mashuri makuru na Kaminuza.
Intagamburuzwa icyiciro cya Kabiri zitabiriye Itorero ni 294 kuri magana atatu bari batumiwe, muribo 96 akaba ari igitsina gore. Mu minsi icyenda bazam
...
gufungura iri torero ku mugaragaro harimo Umunyamabanga uhoraho muri Ministeri y’Uburezi Dr NTIVURUZWA Celestin wasabye izi ntore gukoresha neza umwanya wose bazamara Nkumba. Iri torero ry’Intagamburuzwa ribaye mu gihe muri za Kaminuza n’Amashuri makuru biteguye icyo bise Induction week kigamije kwakira Intore zije mu zindi, kuko muri uku kwezi kwa cyenda bateganya kwakira abanyeshuri bashya mu mashuri makuru na Kaminuza. Iri torero ryatangijwe kuri uyu wa mbere rikazasozwa tariki ya 09/09/2015.

Abahanga mu burezi barigira hamwe umuti w’ibibazo ku ireme ry’uburezi
Abahanga mu burezi barimo abashakashatsi, abarimu n’abayobozi ba kaminuza zitandukanye baturutse mu bihugu bya Cameroon, Repuburika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo no mu Rwanda bateraniye I Huye mu nama y’umunsi umwe, aho bari kwigira hamwe uburyo harandurwa ibibazo bitsikamira ireme ry’uburezi mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.
Iyi nama mpuzamahanga yiswe “Conference on Challenges of Educational Quality in Great Lakes Region” yateguwe
... 
 agira uruhare mubyo yigishwa, ibyo byose bigomba kwitabwaho binyuze mu mahugurwa no gukomeza kwigisha”.
Bamwe mu bahanga bitabiriye iyi nama bagaragaje ko kuba abarezi badahabwa ibikoresho bihagije ndetse n’umushahara wabo ukaba ukiri mucye, nabyo bidindiza ireme ry’uburezi.
Bagarutse kandi ku kibazo cy’uko bamwe mu barezi badakunda kwiga no gukora ubushakashatsi.
Justine Mbabazi Niyibizi waturutse muri Kaminuza ya UTAB yagize ati “Nkuko twabigarutseho twasanze twebwe abigisha tudashaka kwiga, 
...
andi nta kwitana ba mwana.
Dr Baguma ati “Ibi byose tuba tuganira ni mu rwego rwo gushaka umuti w’ibibazo bihari mu burezi, kandi tuzi aho turi, tuzi naho dusha kugera, ariko buri wese ku giti cye akwiye kumenya ko uruhare rwe ari ngombwa kugira ngo tugere kucyo twifuza”.
Iyi nama nyunguranabitekerezo ikaba yarateguwe na PIASS ifatanyije na kaminuza ya Bamberg yo mu gihugu cy’u Budage, hagamijwe kwigira hamwe icyateza imbere ireme ry’uburezi mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.

Umuririmbi mu ndirimbo zihimbaza Imana, Uwiringiyimana Théogene (Bose babireba) yakoranye indirimbo n’umuhanzi Ama-G The Black ukunzwe cyane muri iyi minsi mu njyana ya Hip Hop mu Rwanda.
Ushobora kwibaza niba iyi ndirimbo yaba ihimbaza Imana cyangwa ari iy’isi?
Nanone bitewe n’indirimbo Ama-G The Black asanzwe azwiho ko aririmba (zitari izihimbaza Imana) wakeka ko kabaye, Théo (bose babireba) yatangiye kugwa cyangwa se yamaze kugwa, nyamara sibyo kuko Theo aracyahagaze ndetse na Ama G aracyari 
... 
usabe bw’umuhanzi Ama-G The Black maze arabyemererwa ayisubiranamo na nyirayo bwite Théo Bose babireba.
Aganira na IGIHE, Uwiringiyimana Theo yagize ati “Ama-G The Black yansabye ko dusubiranamo indirimbo yanjye ndabyemera. Sinari kubyanga kuko ashaka guhinduka. Birumvikana ni jye wabimufashamo bwa mbere, kuko twaba twakoranye indirimbo ‘Ihimbaza Imana’ , kandi Imana ikeneye ko abantu bahinduka, ahubwo ni intambwe nziza, Ama-G the Black ateye”.
Ubusanzwe umuhanzi Ama-G the Black, mu mazina nyaku
...
e babireba, kuri ubu ari gutegura imishinga itandukanye ya muzika ye, aho ari gutanganya amashusho y’imwe mu ndirimbo ze atavuze iyo ariyo, akaba anategura gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Witwigirizaho nkana”.
Amani Hakizimana aka Ama G the Black nawe ku ruhande rwe, ngo afitanye indirimbo nshya na King James izasohoka mu minsi iri imbere bise “Mana yanjye”.
Amashusho y’indirimbo “Ingoma” isubiwemo (Remix) ku bufatanye bwa Theo na Ama G, azasohoka mu minsi mike iri imbere.

Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Prudence Rubingisa, yasobanuye ko ubutaka budakoreshwa bujya mu bubiko bw’ubutaka (land bank), hagamijwe ko buhabwa abashoramari bakeneye kandi bashoboye kubukoresha.

... 
za Rusororo, Kabuga na Masaka. Umujyi wa Kigali ugaragaza ko muri rusange ubarura ibibanza bisaga 50 bitabyazwa umusaruro birimo 20 biri mu murongo utukura.

zo kugira icyo akora ni uko abona ko iby’ibanze byahageze.’’

Ese ubundi urukundo ruturuka he?
Benshi bibaza ko ikintu cyose gikorewe mu mubiri byanze bikunze gituruka ku bwonko kuko iyo umuntu asitaye abyumvira mu bwonko ndetse n’ikindi kintu icyari cyo cyose gikorewe mu mubiri gihera mu bwonko ari nayo mpamvu bamwe bavuga ko n’urukundo rushobora kuba ruturuka mu bwonko.
Uretse ibyo kandi hari n’abandi bemeza neza ko urukundo ruva mu mutima cyane ko iyo umuntu akunze byumvikanira mu mutima aho usanga igitima cy’umuntu kidihaguza cyane kubera gukunda ndetse hari n’ubwo umuntu aba agikubita amaso uwo akunda umutima ukamusimbuka akaba ariho bahera bavuga ko urukundo ruturuka mu mutima cyane ko no mu kurushushanya benshi biyandikira umutima.
Ese hagati y’ubwonko n’umutima, urukundo ruturuka he?
Nyuma yo gusanga benshi batabivugaho kimwe, abahanga mu by’ubuzima bagerageje kurebera hamwe inkomoko y’urukundo maze baza guhuriza ku kuba ruturuka mu bwonko mu gice cyihariye kizwi nka Hypothalamus mu ndimi z’amahanga.
Iki gice gifite akazi ko kugenzura bimwe mu bice by’umubiri bindi birimo: umutima, ibihaha ndetse n’igifu, iki gice rero kigira uruhare mu guha amakuru umubiri wose harimo n’umutima ari nayo mpamvu twavuga ko n'ubwo umutima udaturukamo ibyiyumviro byo gukunda, ariko ugira uruhare mu kugaragaza bya byiyumviro.

Umucyo Portal Ejo Hazaza Umujyi Wa Gari Ya Moshi Umucyo Mucyo ni igishushanyo mbonera cya Yibin Umuvuduko wa Gariyamoshi Umujyi. Ivugurura ryimibereho irasaba imyaka yose umwaka wose. Kuruhande rwa Gariyamoshi Yihuta Yihuta yatangiye gukora kuva muri Kamena 2019, Centre ya Yibin Greenland igizwe na metero 160 z'uburebure buvanze-gukoresha Twin Towers ihuza imyubakire na kamere hamwe na kilometero 1 z'uburebure. Yibin ifite amateka yimyaka irenga 4000, ikusanya ubwenge numuco nkuko imyanda yo mu ruzi yaranze iterambere rya Yibin. Twin Towers ikora nk'urubuga rworoheje rwo kuyobora abashyitsi kimwe n'ahantu nyaburanga abaturage bateranira.
Izina ry'umushinga : Light Portal, Izina ryabashushanya : QUAD studio, Izina ry'abakiriya : QUAD studio.
Iki gishushanyo cyiza nuwatsindiye igihembo cya zahabu mugihe cyo kumurika ibicuruzwa no kumurika imishinga yo gushushanya. Ugomba rwose kubona ibihembo bya zahabu byatsindiye abashushanya ibishushanyo mbonera kugirango uvumbure ibindi byinshi bishya, bishya, byumwimerere kandi bihanga ibicuruzwa byo kumurika nibikorwa byo gushushanya imishinga.

ISILAMU
Bimwe mu byo Korani yigisha
Allah ni Umuremyi wa byose
Urugero: Allah yaremye umuntu mu ibumba ry’umukara naho amajini ayarema mu muriro.
Soma Korani 15:26-27
(26) Mu by’ukuri twaremye umuntu mu itaka ryumye, mu ibumba ry’umukara rihindagurika (27) N’amajini twayaremye mbere mu muriro ufite samuum
Ibisobanuro by'amagambo
(1) Umuyisilamu ufite ubumenyi bw’idini aradusobanurira amajini icyo aricyo:
“Al Jinnu (amajini): Ibyo ni ibindi biremwa mu byo Imana yaremye. Amajini yaremwe mu muriro. Kandi ntidushobora kuyabona. Muri yo harimo amayisilamu kimwe natwe kandi muri yo harimo amahakanyi, abakafiri bo mu majini bitwa amashitani, kandi amashitani ni abanzi b’umwemera uwo ariwe wese, aramushukashuka kugeza ubwo amutesheje inzira y’ukuri”
Ibi bisobanuro biri ku rupapuro rwa 14, mu gitabo Gahunda y’Amashuri ya Korani (igice cya kabiri) cyanditwe n’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu bo muri Afrika, Ibiro byo mu Rwanda, Ishami ry’Uburezi (Umwaka 2001 ariwo 1422-H)
(2) Samuum ni umwuka ushyshye uturuka muri djahannam (Gehenomu), urup.253, Ibisobanuro bya Qoran Ntagatifu mu Kinyarwanda, 2011.

Muyoboke Alexis wigeze kuba umujyanama w’itsinda rya Charly na Nina avuga ko ngo aba bakobwa ari bo yakongera gukorana nabo mu bahanzi banyuze mu biganza gusa ngo ntibishoboka.
Tariki 20 Gashyantare 2018 ni bwo Charly na Nina batunguranye bashyira hanze itangazo rivuga ko batandukanye n’uwari umujyanama wabo mu bya muzika ari we Muyoboke Alexis.
Decent Entertainment iyoborwa na Muyoboke Alexis yari imaze imyaka itanu ikorana n’aba bakobwa bari bamaze kubaka ibigwi mu Karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo
... 
Bebe Cool n’izindi nyinshi.
Batandukanye bamaze gukora igitaramo cy’amateka cyo kumurika alubumu yabo yiswe “Imbaraga” cyitabiriwe na Juliana Kanyomozi.
Ni ibintu byatunguye benshi barimo na Muyoboke Alexis ubwe wavuze ko atari abyiteze.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na KISS FM, Muyoboke Alexis yabajijwe umuhanzi yakwifuza kongera gukorana na we mu bamuciye mu biganza bose avuga ko ari Charly na Nina.
Ati “Mvugishije ukuri urabizi ko ntajya mbeshya, nakorana na Charly na Nina. Kuko ibitekerezo nari mfit
...
i batangiye kutumenya.”
Muyoboke Alexis yavuze ko kugeza ubu bidashoboka ko yakongera gukorana na Charly na Nina ariko ubu ahanze amaso umuhanzi mushya witwa Chris Hat yifuza gufasha akarenga urwego aba bakobwa bagezeho.
Kugeza ubu itsinda rya Charly na Nina risa n’iridahari kuko amezi umunani yose ashize nta ndirimbo bashyira hanze, ndetse bikomeje kuvugwa ryamaze gusenyuka burundu, ibintu bamwe bavuga ko bishingiye ku nzigo iri hagati ya Muyoboke Alexis na DJ Pius ushinjwa gushuka aba bakobwa.

Kibeho ni umujyi muto uherereye mu karere ka Nyaruguru mu majyepfo y’u Rwanda. Ni ahantu hamenyekanye cyane igihe habaga amabonekerwa mu mwaka wa 1981 akaba ari naho hari ishusho ya Yezu ku rwego rwa Afurika ifite icyicaro aho i Kibeho. Niyo shusho nini ku isi ifite uburebure bwa metero esheshatu (6), ipima ibiro magana cyenda na mirongo itanu (950 kg).

Kaminuza y’u Rwanda yamaze kwemerera abanyeshuli 370 barangije mu ishami ryigisha ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi ko bazahabwa impamyabumenyi ndetse bakazakora ibirori byo kwambara amakanzu [graduation].
Aba banyeshuli bari bamaze igihe bahangangayitse,bandikiye minisitiri w’Ubuzima,Dr Diane Gashumba bamumenyesha iki kibazo,abasubiza ko bazakorana inama nabayobozi batandukanye bashinzwe uburezi bagakemura iki kibazo.
Ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize nibwo hateranye inama yahuje inzego zifite aho zihuriye n’iki kibazo aho mu myanzuro yavuyemo harimo ko aba banyeshuri bahabwa impamyabumenyi nk’abandi.
Iyi nama yari yitabiriwe na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Diane Gashumba, Minisitiri w’Uburezi, Dr Mutimura Eugène, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’agateganyo wa HEC, Benjamin Muhizi Kageruka, Umuyobozi wa Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Prof Philip Cotton, Umuyobozi Wungirije, Dr Charles Murigande n’abari bahagarariye abanyeshuri biga muri iri shami ry’ubuvuzi.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’ubuvuzi [Dean], Dr Jean Claude Byiringiro, yavuze ko nyuma y’iyi nama yo ku wa Gatanu bemeje ko aba banyeshuri bagomba guhabwa impamyabumenyi.
Yagize ati “Twafashe umwanzuro ko abanyeshuri bazahabwa impamyabumenyi kandi turabyishimiye.”
Aba banyeshuli bari babwiwe ko batazahabwa impamyabumenyi kubera ko hari amasomo batize neza.
Ibirori bya Graduation biteganyijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu taliki ya 08 Ugushyingo 2019 i Huye.
Abayobozi bashinzwe uburezi n’ubuzima bemeje ko abanyeshuli bize ubuganga bazahabwa impamyabumenyi

Imashini itara yimodoka irashobora kugabanywa mumatara yimbere, amatara yinyuma, ibimenyetso byerekana, hamwe namatara yicyapa, nibindi. Kugirango ukore neza amatara yimodoka bisaba gushiraho neza itara ryimodoka.Dushushanya amatara yimodoka atandukanye dukurikije ibyifuzo bitandukanye byabakiriya.Imashini itara ryimodoka ni iyibice byinyuma, amatara agomba guhangana nimbaraga nyinshi zo hanze n'ingaruka zidukikije.Nkigice cyingenzi cyimodoka, ibikoresho bikoreshwa cyane mubyuma byamatara ni S136, NAK80, nibindi. .
Sunwinmould nisosiyete ikora neza, yujuje ubuziranenge bwo gukora amatara yimodoka mu Bushinwa.suwninmould yateje imbere amatara atandukanye, kandi ifite uburambe bunini mumatara yimodoka hamwe namatara yimodoka.Dukoresha ibikoresho bigezweho byo gutunganya kugirango ubuso bwamatara yimodoka bugaragare neza, bityo tubike igihe cyo gusya.Kugirango tumenye neza ibipimo byububiko, dukoresha ibikoresho byo gupima ibikoresho byo gupima hamwe nibikoresho byo gupima ibipimo byo gupima umwobo, intangiriro nibindi bice byububiko bwamatara yimodoka.Mubyongeyeho, dukoresha imashini zitera inshinge za tonnage zitandukanye kugirango tumenye ubwiza bwibibumbano, kandi binyuze mubikorwa byigihe kirekire byasubiwemo kugirango tumenye neza ko ibumba ryujuje ubuziranenge.

Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w'ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Mfite ibyiringiro” igusha ku gutanga ihumure ku bantu bugarijwe n'ibibazo byo mu Isi.
“Mfite ibyiringiro” ni indirimbo ya kabiri Korali Shalom yashyize hanze kuva umwaka watangira. Iheruka yitwa “Wampaye amahoro'' yasohotse Muri Mutarama 2020.
Shalom iri muri korali zikunzwe mu ruhando rw'abakunzi b'umuziki uhimbaza Imana, Haba mu Rwanda ndetse no hanze yarwo.
Iyi korali imaze im
... 
Yesu.
Yagize ati “Yibutsa abantu gukomeza kugira ibyiringiro ko hari igihe Umwami wacu azadusanganira akadukiza indwara z'ibyorezo. Umuvugabutumwa cyangwa umuhanzi mwiza agenda ahumuriza abantu. Aho ibintu bigeze, abantu benshi batakaje ibyiringiro ariko nkuko ijambo ry'Imana ribivuga mu Abafilipi 1.20 dukwiye ‘gutegerezanya ibyiringiro yuko tutazakorwa n'isoni z'ikintu cyose'.''
Yakomeje avuga ko nubwo abantu babaho mu bukene cyangwa mu ntambara nk'iz'ibyorezo bikomeye hari ‘icyizere ko bizagen
...
mwa ry'indirimbo.
Yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali y'abana bato, yitwaga “Umunezero”. Icyo gihe muri ADEPR Nyarugenge hari korali nkuru imwe ariyo Hoziyana.
Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina, ifata “Shalom” rimaze gushinga imizi. Iyi korali imaze gukora album enye z'amajwi n'ebyiri z'amashusho.

Mu gihe bamwe mu baturage b’umurenge wa Musheli bavuga ko umuswa wababujije gutera ibiti bikikije amazu yabo hagamijwe kuyarinda gusamburwa n’umuyaga, ubuyobozi bw’uyu murenge buvuga ko bugiye gushakisha umuti urwanya umuswa.
Umurenge wa Musheli ni umwe mu mirenge y’akarere ka Nyagatare ituwe vuba. Mbere wahoze ari pariki y’akagera kugeza mu mwaka wa 1994. Aho uturijwemo abaturage ibiti kimeza byarimo byaratemwe ariko ntihaterwa ibindi ku bwinshi. Kanyankore Jean Baptiste wo mu mudugudu wa Kibirizi akagali ka Musheli inzu ye iherutse gutwarwa n’umuyaga ndetse n’umwana we wari uyirimo agwirwa n’amatafari yitaba Imana. Avuga ko bagerageje gutera ibiti kugira ngo birinde umuyaga ariko umuswa udatuma bikura. Ku ubu ngo mwikwirinda umuyaga bazirika amazu yabo na senyenge.
Habyara Justin umukozi w’umurenge wa Musheli ushinzwe irangamimerere n’ibibazo by’abaturage avuga ko iki kibazo bakimenye kandi kirimo gushakirwa umuti urambye. Ngo barimo gushakisha umuti ushobora guhangana n’umuswa.
Uyu muyobozi ariko akomeza agira abaturage inama zo kureba icyerekezo cy’umuyaga mbere yo kubaka kugira ngo hirindwe ko wasambura amazu yabo mu gihe batari bagira ibiti biwukingira.

Ubwa mbere ndyamana n’umukunzi wanjye narangizaga vuba wenda nkagira ngo nukubera mbikoze bwa mbere ubutaha bizagenda neza kuko njye nabaga numva ntagishaka imibonanompuzabitsina cyane kubera inshuro nabaga maze kurangiza kandi umukunzi wanjye ahubwo aricyo gihe yumva atangiye kubishaka cyane bityo nkumva simushimishije, yego yarirengagizaga nkaho ntacyabaye cyane yishimye gusa ariko mu maso namureba neza nkabona aracyabishaka cyane”
Nahise ngira igitekerezo cyo kugisha inama kugira ngo ndebe ko nashimisha umukunzi wanjye kuko ndamukunda cyane kandi mbona iyo umusore atabasha gushimisha umukunzi we batandukana cyane kandi nanjye ndifuza ko ntatandukana nawe, ese ubu kuba ndangiza vuba nukubera nigize kwikinishaho? Ese kuba ntashimisha umukunzi wanjye neza nabigenza nte ngo ndebe ko namushimisha cyane nkuko mu mutima mbyifuza?.
Umukunzi wacu yifuje inama zanyu cyane kuko abangamiwe kandi afite ipfunwe ryo kuba Ataryohereza umukunzi we mu buriri bityo bikaba byamuviramo kuba batandukana kandi umusore umutima we yaweguriye umukobwa bihagije.

Zimwe muri izo ngaruka harimo:
Kurwara impyiko, bitewe n’uko impyiko zifite imimaro myinshi ku buzima bw’umuntu irimo gusohora imyanda n’ibindi, umuvuduko w’amaraso ukabije ubangamira imikorere y’impyiko bikaba byanaziviramo uburwayi bukomeye. Burya ngo umuvuduko w’amaraso ukabije ushobora gutuma imijyana igaburira ubwonko iturika bikaba byaviramo umuntu uburwayi bwa stroke.
Umuvuduko ukabije w’amaraso ngo nawo utuma umubiri utakaza ubushobozi bwo gukoresha isukari nkuko bikwiriye,ibyo rero iyo bidakosowe bikiri mu maguru mashya, bishobora kugutera diyabete, indwara mbi cyane ndetse idakunze no gukira.

Umuyobozi wa SOSERGI Kalisa Kirenga yabwiye Kigali Today ko Bizimana yaje gusenya inzu ashaka guhisha ibimenyetso bimushinja ibyaha yagiye akora.
... 
enyine, akirukana abakozi, akabahindurira imirimo, ubundi ugasanga arivanga mu mirimo ndetse ategeka abakozi ibyo bakora bitandukanye n’inshingano bafite. Njye yanyirukanye ansabye gukora ibinyuranyije n’amategeko mbyanze aranyirukana ashyiraho abandi, kandi si njye njyenyine kuko n’inama y’ubutegetsi bari kumwe yayeguje muri ubwo buryo.”
Muyombana abajijwe na Kigali Today icyo bagiye gukora nyuma y’ifungwa rya Perezida w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi, yatangaje ko abagize inama bagiye guterana bakareba ic
...
akozwe n’abantu barenze umwe.
SOSERGI ni sosiyete igizwe n’abakozi b’uruganda rwa Bralirwa. Yatangiye muri 2005, ifite abakozi babarirwa hagati ya 280 na 300, ikaba ifite ibikorwa birimo gukora isuku mu ruganda, gukora akazi k’amaboko karimo gupakira no gupakurura, gutwara abakozi ba Bralirwa, kubatekera, gucuruza imbetezi z’uruganda (dreche) hamwe no gucuruza ibikoresho bikoreshwa muri Bralirwa, ikaba ari yo ifite n’inzu ikorerwamo n’ivuriro rya Croix du Sud rizwi nko kwa Nyirinkwaya i Gisenyi.

"Mwami wanjye nje imbere yawe nciye bugufi, ukuboko kwawe kwankozeho ndakira, agahinda ntikazamperana na rimwe, nzahora iteka ryose ngushima. Gumama nanye 
... 
wa. Tonzi yamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise 'Gumana nanjye'

...
washira adashyize hanze indirimbo nshya. Kuwa 26 Kamena 2020 abandi bahanzi bose aba ubwa mbere mu cyiciro cya 2 cy'irushanwa MNI abikesha indirimbo ye 'Hejuru ya byose' yegukanye 2,000,000 Frw. ra gutekereza gutanga itandukaniro mubyimbye byumuringa, nkumuringa mwinshi wumuringa kubisabwa bisaba kongera ubushobozi bwubu.Uku kwihindura bizemerera imiyoboro yoroheje ya Capel guhuza ninganda nini zinganda n'ibikoresho bisabwa.

...
aragaramo ibara ryumuhondo wo gusudira ibara ryerekana ibara ryerekana mugihe cyo gukora no guteranya.Ubu buryo bushya bwikoranabuhanga bworoshya ibikorwa byumusaruro kandi bigabanya ibyago byamakosa mugushira ibice no kugurisha.
Igisubizo cya tekiniki:
Capel irashobora gutekereza gutanga amahitamo yihariye mukurwanya gusudira amabara kugirango uhuze ibyifuzo byabakiriya cyangwa ibisabwa.Ihinduka rizongera kunezeza abakiriya no kurushaho kunoza imikorere.

Gukomera mu mutwe si ibintu uragwa n’ababyeyi kandi si ibintu wiga mu ishuri. Ni umwitozo bwite, ni umwanzuro wawe bwite kandi kugirango ubigereho hari byinshi usabwa. Mu gihe akenshi buri ntangiriro z’umwaka usanga tugena imigambi tuzagenderaho uwo mwaka wose, ni gake usanga uzirikana kuri wowe ubwawe kandi burya ibuka ko bihera mu mutwe. Kugirango ube ukomeye mu mutwe, hari ibyo utagomba kwirengagiza. Ni byo tugiye kuvugaho.

Ahari wavuga uti ndiyizi ariko burya wasanga utiyizi uko bik
... 
byo ahubwo bikaguha ingufu z’ahazaza

Ha agaciro ibyo uvugwaho
Mu kubiha agaciro uzite ku bintu bibiri: Ese baramvuga uko ndi? Ese barambeshyera? Niba uvugwa uko uri, kandi ari nabi, haranira guhinduka. Niba uvugwa nabi nyamara wiyiziho kubeshyerwa, shakisha aho wabateye kukwibeshyaho cyangwa uwabateye kukubeshyera ugire ibyo uhindura zaba inshuti cyangwa imyitwarire yawe
-
Ihutire kumva utinde kuvuga
Baravuga ngo n’umusazi arasara akagwa ku ijambo. Ikintu ubwirwa jya ugiha agaciro kuko nta jam
...
kunda, mbese wigerageze kandi utsinde. Bizatuma urushaho kumva ko n’izindi ngorane wazicamo bigashoboka.
-
Menya guheba
Icyagiye kiba cyagiye, uwagiye aba yagiye kandi igihe cyatakaye ntabwo wakigarura. Ibi jya ubizirikana bitume utizirika ku byahise, utaba nka cya kirondwe kiguma ku ruhu inka yarariwe kera cyangwa wa mubyeyi ukomeza guheka ingombyi gusa umwana yahise. Niba ibintu byagiye, ukaba ntacyo wakora ngo ubigarure, heba nyine ushake ibibisimbura, ubuzima bukomeze

Nyuma yo kubona ibimenyetso bigaragara ku bikarito igice cya mbere (1), ndagarutse n’igice cya 2 hariho ibindi bitandukanye ariko nabyo by’ingenzi ukwiye kumenya.
Ibimenyetso kubimenya bizagufasha iki?
Bizagufasha ahantu henshi hashoboka rwose by’umwihariko niba uri umucuruzi cyangwa se uri mu bwikorezi bw’ibintu biba bipfunyitse.
Ariko si ibyo gusa kuko no mu buzima busanzwe byagufasha kumenya uko ufata igikoresho cyawe uramutse ukiguze kugira ngo kitangirika.
Reka turebe ibindi bimenyetso biga
... 
 ko kikubuza ibikoresho biri muri icyo gikarito utagomba kubigerekeranya cyangwa ngo ubigerekeho ibindi. Iki gikora kubintu bishobora kwangirika biramutse byongereweho nk’ibindi biro hejuru.
Mu bimenyetso biri imbere turaza kubonamo ikindi cyenda gusa n’ikingiki ariko hagati yabyo harimo itandukaniro rito cyane ariko rifite akamaro.
Indi nkuru: Gukoresha irembo bitagusabye konti.

Akamenyetso k’akagare k’imizigo gateruye ibintu gasobanuye ko ibyo ibikoresho biri mu gikarito b
...
ri iki kimenyetso uzamenya ko ubujijwe kugerekeranya ibyo bikoresho kugeza ku rwego rungana n’umubare wanditse.
Urugero nk’uko handitsemo 4 ni ukuvuga ngo ntiwemere kurenza ibikarito 4 ubigerekeranyije, iki kimenyetso ariko nacyo ntigikunze gukoreshwa cyane.
Aha rero niho iki gitandukanira n’icyo twabonye kuri numero ya 4 (hejuru) kubera ko cyo kikubuza kugerekeranya na rimwe.

Kanseri y’inkondo y’umura yibasira abakobwa n’abagore. Iyi nkuru yagufasha gusobanukirwa kanseri y’inkondo y’umura, ibiyitera, ndetse n’uburyo bwo kuyirinda.
Nkuko tubikesha ishyirahamwe ritanga inama ku bijyanye n’indwara ya kanseri zitandukanye ryitwa American Cancer Society ritangaza ko abagera kuri 12,280 basuzumwe iyi kanseri muri Amerika abarenga 4’000 muri bo bapfuye bazira iyi kanseri gusa nanone iyi kanseri iyo ifatiranywe bikiri mu maguru mashya haba hari amahirwe yuko ishobora gukira.
... 
 byongera ibyago byo kurwara iyi kanseri bitewe nuko uko ukorana imibonano mpuzabitsinda n’abantu batandukanye uba ushobora guhura nufite iriya Papilloma( HPV) twabonye ko yongera ibyago byo kurwara kanseri y’inkondo y’umura
Kunywa itabi: biri mu bintu byongera ibyago byo kurwara kanseri zitandukanye ndetse niyi irimo.
Gukica intege k’ubwirinzi kamere: ibi bikunze kugaragara ku barwayi b’indwara zidakira bahora bafata imiti nk’ababana n’ubwandu bwa SIDA,Diyabete, ndetse n’abahawe ingingo zimwe n
...
nyetso by’iyi Kanseri bisa n’iby’ubwandu (Infection),mu gihe ubonye kimwe muri ibi bimenyetso ukwiye kwihutira kureba muganga.
Icyo wakora ngo wirinde kurwara iyi ndwara
bimwe mu byo wakora ukagabanya ibyago byo kurwara kanseri y’inkondo y’umura harimo:
Gufata urukingo rwa kanseri y’inkondo y’umura ku bana bakiri bato
Kwisuzumisha nibura nyuma y’imyaka ibiri
Kuzibukira itabi
Kwirinda gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’abantu batandukanye

Tanga igitekerezo

Yabigarutseho mu ijambo yavugiye mu muhango wo gusoza ihuriro rusange ry’umuryango wa Unity Club Intwararumuri, wabaye mu ijoro ryo ku itariki 16 Ukwakira 2021, hanizihizwa isabukuru y’imyaka 25 uwo muryango umaze ushinzwe.
Mu ijambo rye yagize ati “Ndashimira abari n’Abategarugori, babaye igitekerezo, baba igikorwa kijyanye n’ubumwe bw’Igihugu cyacu birangwa na Unity Club, ndabashimira cyane.
Ati “Abadamu, abategarugori n’abari mu mateka yacu, mu buzima bw’Igihugu cyacu ntawabura gukomeza kubas
... 
abo mubyara ndetse wagira amahirwe abo mubyara na bo bakabyara, ndetse bakabyara abakobwa”.
Arongera ati “Ibyo mvuga ku giti cyanjye ndabizi ko mbisangiye namwe mwese cyangwa abenshi muri mwe, mu buzima bwanjye bw’akazi hari abakuyobora, nagize abanyobora igihe kimwe ku ruhande rumwe, ngira n’abanyobora igihe cyose.
Igihe kimwe ubwo ni hanze mu kazi gasanzwe, abakuyobora igihe cyose bakaba abo mubana, ni abo tubana nyine nabavuze, ni uguhera ku bakubyara, abo mwashakanye abo mubyara n’abo babyar
...
ndi.
Ati “Buri wese uko yicaye hano, umwanya wawe urahari, igihe ukiriho ufite icyo ubereyeho kugeza igihe uzaba utakiriho, icya mbere tuberaho, hera kuri twe umuntu aba ariho, icya kabiri umuntu aberaho ni undi muntu, kubaho ku giti cyawe no kubaho ku giti cy’undi muntu”.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kubaka ubwo bumuntu Unity Club iharanira byaturutse ku gitekerezo cy’abagore, ari na ho ahera abashimira ko izo ndangagaciro batazihereranye ahubwo bazigeza no ku bagabo, na bo bibona muri Unity Club.

Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo gishinzwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, RAB bwasabye abashinzwe ubuhinzi mu Turere twose tugize iyi Ntara ko guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu bafatanyije n’abakozi ba RAB, bagomba kuva mu biro bakegera abahinzi mu mirima bagafatanya gukemura ibibazo byagaragaye muri iki gihembwe cy’ihinga cya 2024A.
Mu bikorwa bizibandwaho harimo kugeza ifumbire n’umuti wica udukoko nka Nkongwa ku bahinzi muri iki gihe cy’ibagara bahereye ku bahinga ku buso bunini.
Abayobozi bashinzwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi mu Turere tugize iyi ntara y’amajyaruguru bavuga ko hari ingamba bafashe.
RAB kandi yahaye umurongo ibibazo bikibangamiye abahinzi bo mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru birimo abari basanzwe bakorana na Tubura babuze ifumbire n’imbuto, ko bagiye guhindurirwa uburyo bakoreshaga bagafashwa kubona ifumbire.

Umuturage wo mu Murenge wa Gihundwe mu Karere ka Rusizi wigeze gufungwa akabanza kubura, n’ubu akomeje gufungwa, nyamara abaturage baramutangiye ubuhamya ko ubujura bwamufungishije atajya abukora.
Uyu muturage wo mu Kagari ka Gatsiro, yafunganywe na mugenzi we umwe nyuma y’uko havuzwe amakuru ko hari mudasobwa 21 zibwe ku kigo cy’ishuri kiri mu Murenge wa Nkanka.
Nyuma go gufatwa, abo mu muryango we babwiye RADIOTV10 ko bamubuze ahantu hose bakekaga ko yaba afungiye, gusa Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu 
... 
engerazuba, SP Bonaventure Twizere Karekezi aza guhumuriza umuryango agira ati “abo baturage babwire bashire impumu umuntu wabo ari kuri APEDUC.”
Aha kuri APEDUC mu Murenge wa Gihundwe, hasanzwe hanyura by’igihe gito abajya mu igororamuco, gusa bo mu muryango w’uyu muturage babanje kujyayo baramubura.
Mu nteko y’abaturage b’Akagari ka Gatsiro, bahamije ko Nyabyenda Alphonse wari usanzwe acuruza ibirayi byokeje atiba ndetse bakora inyandiko yagombaga kujya aho ari kugororerwa inasinywaho n’Akagar
...
yagira icyo bitanga.
Umubyeyi we witwa Nyirangayaboshya Daphrose agira ati “Abaturage barabyemeje ko uwo mwana atiba, narujyanye aho afungiye banga kumufungura bavuga ko ngo yibye kandi abaturage bavuze ko ari umwere.”
Umuyobozi Wungirije w’Akarere ka Rusizi ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage, Dukuzumuremyi Anne Marie yabwiye RADIOTV10 ko agiye gukurikirana iby’iki kibazo. Yagize ati “Reka nkurikirane, simbona impamvu yo kurenganya umuturage”.

Qui bene cantat bis orat ! Bishatse kuvuga ngo Uririmbye neza aba asenze kabiri, bikaba akarusho iyo ubifashijwemo n’amajwi meza y’inkumi, abasore abagabo n’abagore babitorejwe muri Chorale de Kigali.
Ibi urabasha kubyumva neza niba waraye witabiriye igitaramo ngarukamwaka cyiswe Christmas Carols Concert, cyabaye ku mugoroba wo kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 22 Ukuboza 2019.
Imbaga y’abakunzi b’umuziki
... 
iri.
Igice cya kabiri cyari gitandukanye cyane dore ko abaririmbyi ba Chorale de Kigali bagaragaje ubuhanga mu kuririmba indirimbo zavuye mu bice bya Opera (indirimbo ziririmbwa zikinwa). Niho kandi abaririmba ari umwe (Solistes) bigaragaje.
Babifashijwemo n’itsinda ry’abazungu baje gufatanya na Chorale de Kigali mu kwitegura iki gitaramo baririmbye indirimbo zitandukanye maze abitabiriye igitaramo barafashwa.
Indirimbo yitwa Kleinzac yaririmbwe n’abagabo gusa yishimiwe cyane. Iyi ni imwe muri O
...
ale de Kigali avuga ko nk’ubuyobozi bwa Kiliziya Gatolika bazirikana uruhare ikomeje kugira mu ivugabutumwa kandi bazakomeza kuyishyigikira. Umushumba wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda,yashimiye cyane Chorale de Kigali Abarimo Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Ngirente, Minisitiri w’Ingabo Gen Maj Murasira Albert bitabiriye iki gitaramo
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge Ndayisaba Fidèle akunze kwitabira ibitaramo bya Chorale de Kigali

Nitwa Zirimwabagabo. Narangije amashuri abanza ngiye muyisumbuye kwiga birananira mpitamo kujya gukora akazi ko murugo ahantu mu Gatsata, nagatangiye ntabizi neza ariko buhoro buhoro ndakamenyera. Mabuja na Databuja bakanyizera bakansigira urugo bagiye gushaka imibereho.
Hashize imyaka itatu ngatangiye, Mabuja yabyaye umwana we wa kabiri biba ngombwa ko bazana undi mukozi wo kurera umwana. Ubwo iterambere ry'urugo ryarakataje noneho Databuja azana undi mukozi mushya w'umukobwa wabyigiye amushing
... 
shaka ubwoba bwaranyishe ngira ngo ni ikosa nakoze, musanga aho yari yicaye muruganiriro arambwira ngo arashaka ko muguriza amafaranga 50,000 Rwf ko agize akabazo kihutirwa kandi adashaka ko Databuja abimenya. Narayamuhaye arishima cyane aransimbukira ansoma ku itama, ndijijisha ndasohoka. Hashize icyumweru arayansubiza ariko aranambwira ngo arashaka kunsengerera kubera namugobotse nkamuguriza ari mukaga. Ubwo yaramfashe anjyana ahantu angurira ibyo kurya n'ibyo kunywa turasangira, turaganira bi
...
anurira ko Databuja atamufata neza, ko ntakanya ko kumwitaho ajya abona mbese Databuja yikundira guhora kukazi kuruta uko yaba ari kumwe na Mabuja mu rugo. Ubu Mabuja ndamukunda cyane urukundo rw'ukuri kuburyo numva ntawundu wambere umufasha uretse we rero sinshobora kumwitesha, kandi nawe arankunda ubu rero ndi gupanga uburyo namucikana tukajya kwibanira ahantu kure Databuja atazi. Rero bakunzi, inama nkeneye si izo kumureka ahubwo ni iz'uburyo nakoresha kugira ngo nibanire na Mabuja akaramata.

Yashizweho kugirango akore neza - Byashizweho byumwihariko kuramba no guhangayikishwa no gukoresha kubuntu, ubu buryo bushya bushya butanga imikorere myiza nibikorwa kuruta amasabune gakondo.Icyuma kiramba - Icyuma cyogeramo isabune yo mu bwiherero cyakozwe mu buryo bwihariye kugirango gitange imikorere myiza ishoboka yo gutanga amasabune y'intoki ku isoko.Ibyuma bidafite ingese bitanga igihe kirekire kubucuruzi bwawe cyangwa murugo.Pompe yo mu rwego rwo hejuru - Uru rukuta rwashyizwemo isabune 
... 
ibyuma na plastiki.Kubera iyo mpamvu, andi masosiyete afite igipimo cyo kumeneka hejuru.Kuri Bodie, dukoresha gusa ubuziranenge bwo hejuru bwa pompe zose zumuringa ziguha uburinzi bwiza butarinda kuboneka kuboneka murukuta rwamasabune.Ikimenyetso cyerekana ruswa - Ubu bwiherero bwisabune yisabune ifite isabune yimbere ya plastike imbere itanga uburinzi bwangirika.Ibindi bicuruzwa bitanga isabune idafite ibyuma bidafite umurongo kandi bifite ibibazo byangirika byimbere bituma isabune ihinduka umu
...
ogukoresha ikoresha polymer yimbere kugirango itange uburinzi bwokwirinda kwangirika kuguha imikorere myiza idafite impungenge zishoboka.Ibipimo n'ibirimo - Iyi disikuru nini yisabune ifite 37 oz.(1100 ml) ibikoresho byubushobozi.Ifite uburebure bwa santimetero 8, ubugari bwa 4 7/8, ubugari bwa 2 7/8 (4 7/8 z'uburebure harimo pompe).Yakozwe hamwe nubwiza buhanitse 304 ibyuma bidafite ingese.Ibirimwo: utanga isabune, isahani yo gushiraho, inanga y'urukuta, imigozi, urufunguzo rw'isabune y'intoki.

Vatikani irashaka ko izina ry’Imana ritongera gukoreshwa ukundi
ABAYOBOZI ba Kiliziya Gatolika barashaka ko izina ry’Imana ritongera gukoreshwa mu gitambo cya misa. Mu mwaka ushize, Akanama ka Vatikani Gashinzwe Iyobokamana n’Itangwa ry’amasakaramentu koherereje inama z’abasenyeri ba Kiliziya Gatolika ku isi hose amabwiriza ku birebana n’imikoreshereze y’iryo zina. Uwo mwanzuro wafashwe “hakurikijwe amabwiriza” yatanzwe na papa.
Iyo nyandiko yo ku itariki ya 29 Kamena 2008, ivuga ko nubwo hatanz
... 
ya misa za Kiliziya Gatolika, mu ndirimbo no mu masengesho.”
Kugira ngo iyo nyandiko ya Vatikani ishyigikire uwo mwanzuro, yibukije “umugenzo wa kera cyane” wakurikizwaga muri Kiliziya Gatolika. Ayo mabwiriza avuga ko no mu buhinduzi bw’Ibyanditswe bya Giheburayo bwitwa Septante, bwabayeho mbere y’Ubukristo, izina ry’Imana ryahinduwemo Kyʹri·os, iryo rikaba ari izina ry’Ikigiriki rihindurwamo “Umwami.” Bityo rero, ayo mabwiriza atsindagiriza ko “kuva na kera Abakristo batigeze bavuga za nyuguti 
...
ngiryo izina ryanjye iteka ryose, nguko uko bazajya banyita banyambaza kuva mu gisekuru kugera mu kindi.”—Kuva 3:15, The Jerusalem Bible.
[Ibisobanuro ahagana hasi ku ipaji]

Abagabo n’abagore bamarira amasaha n’amafaranga mu kwigira beza, kandi hari uburyo karemano byikoramo. Umushakashatsi bwe, Dr. Michael Roizen yerekanye ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bigira ingaruka nziza ku mubiri zirenze kure iziva mu byo bisiga. Gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bifite umumaro ni nayo mpamvu ikwiye gukorwa buri gihe
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’umuhanga Dr Michael Roizen yerekanye ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina mu gihe bikozwe neza, ko ari umusumburo wo gukira indwara nyinshi cyane cyane izifite aho zihuriye n’ubwonko.
Abantu benshi muri iki gihe bahangayikishijwe n’izamuka rikabije ry’indwara zifitanye isano n’ubwonko kuko ari indwara zihitana umubare munini w’abantu ibyo twita gupfa amarabira (Premature death).
Abahanga mubijyanye n’ubuvuzi bagaragaje ko ibyo bintu bifitanye isano no gukora
cyangwa kudakora imibonano mpuzabitsina itanoze mbese idakozwe neza ibyo benshi bakunda kuvuga byo kurangiza vuba bigatera umugore nawe kutarangiza (Kugeza ku byishimo byabo byanyuma muri icyo gikorwa).

Umuhanzi wo muri Amerika wamamaye mu njyana ya R&B, Ne-Yo, yahishuye uburyo kumva indirimbo ze bimufasha cyane cyane iyo ari gutera akabariro n’umugore.
Shaffer Chimere Smith uzwi nka Ne-Yo ni umuririmbyi
ukomeye wo muri Amerika wakunzwe cyane mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo “So Sick”,
“Miss Independent” n’izindi zitandukanye.
Ubwo yaganiraga n’ikinyamakuru
TMZ, Ne-Yo, yavuze ko akunda kumva indirimbo ze cyane ko zimufasha mu gihe cyo
gutera akabariro we n’umugore we Crystal Renay.
Ne-Yo yavuze ko iyo
bagiye muri iki gikorwa, umugore we afite urutonde rw’indirimbo yatoranyije
ubundi agahita atangira kuzicuranga.
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko mu
rutonde rurerure rw’indirimbo ze, izigenda gake ari zo zigenda zimufasha
kurushaho kumererwa neza ariko ngo iyitwa “Mirror” yo ni agahebuzo.
Imwe mu ndirimbo umugore
wa Ne-Yo adakunda kumva mu gihe bari kubaka urugo ngo ni iyitwa “Miss
Independent” yakunzwe n’abantu benshi cyane.
Ne-Yo wamennye ibanga ryo mu buriri bwe, ni umwe mu byamamare byasuye u Rwanda mu mwaka ushize wa 2019.

Khalida, uyu ni umugore w’Umuyisilamukazi wo muri Palestine, ubu akaba yarabaye umukristokazi nyuma yo kubonekerwa n’Umwami Yesu Kristo.
Khalida kuva mu bwana bwe ntiyigeze agira amahoro mu buzima bwe, kuko yapfushije nyina agifite iminsi 9 gusa, ubwo kuva icyo gihe ntibyahereye aho, ahubwo se yahise amutererana arigendera. Akana karerewe mu mpfubyi kugeza aho kagereje imyaka 9 , umunsi umwe kagiye kuvoma, maze igisacu cyo mu bwoko bwa Bombe cyaje gisenya icyo kigo karererwagamo, maze ubwo ubwo 
... 
Amerika, ariko atangira kujya amukubita aza no kumumena umusaya. Inkuru igeze aha, Umunyamakuru yabajije Khalida ukuntu yashoboraga kwihanganira uwo mugabo, Khalida amusubiza amubwira ko Muri Islamu, gukosora umugore muri ubwo buryo byemewe kuko ngo birimo kumwigisha. Khalida hano avuga yisekera ati ” Nyamara nta nyigisho nakuyemo!” ntibyarangiriye aho ariko, kuko uwo mugabo noneho, yamumenyesheje ko agiye kuzamwica, Khalida niko kumuhunga arigendera ari kumwe n’abana batatu, aza kwakirwa n’umuk
...
ru, n’ibindi biremwa byikura amakamba bimuramya.
Khalida aho niho yemereye Umwana W’Imana, akurayo ububasha mu kuramya Imana budasanzwe, ubu ajya akoresha ku buryo amaze gusengera benshi abakiza za Kanseri, n’izindi ndwara, Khalida avuga ko umuntu ashoboye kuramya Imana mu buryo bukwiye, akayiramya hejuru y’ibibazo byose yahura nabyo, hejuru y’ikintu cyose, ngo uwo muntu ntacyamunesha.
Ngubwo ubuhamya bwa Khalida, N’imirimo Yesu akomeje gukora buri munsi,
Azabazana Yesu azabazana!

Nshuti mukiriya,
Turabibutsa ko inganda nyinshi zo mubushinwa zizahagarika gukora mugihe cyibiruhuko.
Ibiruhuko bya Leyu bizatangira ku ya 4 Gashyantare kugeza 25 Gashyantare, 2021.
Mubyukuri orders ibicuruzwa byinshi byemejwe mbere yitariki ya 20 Mutarama 2021 birashobora koherezwa mbere yikiruhuko.
Nyamara, inganda zose zirahuze cyaneMuri iyi minsi.
Igitekerezo & Gusaba:
Nkuko ibiruhuko bigiye kuba birebire,
wibuke kugenzura ibicuruzwa byawe no gusubiza inyuma ibicuruzwa byawe mugihe.
Nyamuneka nyamuneka udukorere neza kandi utwandikire kare niba ufite amabwiriza ategereje, tuzagukorera vuba bishoboka mugihe tugarutse kukazi.
Urakoze kubwinkunga ikomeye burigihe.
Mwaramutse
Ikipe yo kugurisha
Igihe cyo kohereza: Mutarama-16-2021

Gahunda y’imbaturabukungu ya kabiri (EDPRS II) izazamura ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo mu turere twinshi tw’igihugu mu rwego rwo kongera umusaruro uturuka ku bukerarugendo, bikazafasha n’abahatuye kongera ubukungu bivana mu bukene.
Mu mujyi wa Kigali EDPRS igamije kugabanya ubukene no kwihutisha iterambere n’ubukungu by’Igihugu. Akarere ka Nyarugenge kagaragaza ko kazita ku gutunganya umusozi wa Mont Kigali hatezwa imbere amateka kuko hatuwe n’abami mu gihe cyo hambere bahagize amateka.
Mu Ntara y’
... 
a ko mu Karere ka Rutsiro hazubakwa imihanda, hubakwe ibyambu n’amahoteli ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu ; hubakwe aho kurara ku bakerarugendo mu ishyamba rya Gishwati n’irya Mukura.
Uturere twa Rubavu na Rusizi EDPRS II yaduteguriye kuzubakwamo imihanda, amahoteli n’ibyambu mu guteza imbere ubukerarugendo ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu mu turere dutanu ari two Rubavu, Karongi, Rutsiro, Nyamasheke na Rusizi
Mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba gahunda y’imbaturabukungu ya kabiri igaragaza ko mu Karere ka Rw
...
korwa bazareberwa aho gutuzwa hafi y’ibyo bikorwa na bo bagasogongera ku bikorwa bizaba bije bibagana mu turere batuyemo.
Umuyobozi wungirije w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, Clare Akamanzi, avuga ko gahunda y’imbaturabukungu ya kabiri igomba kuzafasha no mu kongera umubare wa ba mukerarugendo basura u Rwanda kandi bagera mu Rwanda bakakiranwa urugwiro bikazafasha mu kongera umusaruro ukomoka ku bukerarugendo.
Ibi ni bimwe mu byo EDPRS II yateganyije bizakorwa mu bukerarugendo

Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe uburezi REB, kuri uyu wa mbere cyavuze ko bagiye gukorana n’urugaga rw’abanditsi b’ibibitabo mu Rwanda. Uru ngo ruzabafasha kunoza imyandikire n’ireme ry’ibikubiye mu bitabo bikoreshwa mu burezi. Uru rugaga narwo rwemeza ko rugiye gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka umuco wo gusoma bahereye mubana bato.
Ubu bufatanye bw’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe uburezi REB, ndetse n’urugaga rw’abanditsi nyarwanda; impande zombi zigaragaza ko bigiye kuzamura umuco wo gusoma muri rusange. Gusa ku rwego rw’uburezi bo bavuga ko aba banditsi baje kunoza imyandikire n’ireme ry’ibikubiye mu bitabo bikoreshwa mu mashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye.
Dr. Irene Ndayambaje, ni we muyobozi mukuru wa REB:
“Ubu bufatanye buzarenga ibitabo bagiye kujya bandika, banadutere ingabo mu bitugu aho natwe tugiye kuzajya tubereka ibikenewe mu muco nyarwanda, hanyuma bakabyandika babinyujije mu nyandiko basanzwe bandika, ndetse natwe igihe hazaba hari ibitabo twanditse dukeneye gusohora, tukazajya twunganirana kugirango zirusheho gusohoka zinoze haba mu rwego rw’imyandikire ndetse n’ibigize izo nyandiko (content).

Uwitwa Ndatimana Spéciose avuga ko nyuma yo guhabwa inka muri 2010 imugejeje kuri byinshi mu iterambere ry’urugo rwe aho na we afasha abandi.
Ati “Nta sambu twagiraga twari abakene dufite n’ikibazo cy’imirire mibi, ariko aho bampereye inka bakampa n’amahugurwa y’uko ngomba kuyorora ingejeje ku bukire! Nato
... 
.

Umushinga "Heifer" ukomeje igikorwa cyo gufasha aborozi bibumbiye mu makoperative y’ubworozi ubaha ibikoresho binyuranye bigizwe n’ibyifashishwa mu gutera amatungo intanga na za moto zizifashishwa mu kugeza amata ku makusanyirizo.
Kayumba Charles, Umuyobozi wa "Heifer" mu Rwanda, asaba amakoperative gukoresha neza ibikoresho bahabwa kandi baharanira kongera umu

Umuherwekazi w’umugande wamamaye ubwo yari mu rukundo na Diamond Platnumz, yaburiye abakunzi be kwirinda abatubuzi barimo gukoresha amazina ye n’amafoto bakaka abantu amafaranga.
Mu mashusho uyu mugore uba muri Afurika y’Epfo yashyize ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze, yagaragaje ko ahanganyikishijwe n’abantu barimo gutuburira abakunzi be babaka amafaranga mu izina rye babasezeranya kubashakira akazi mu mahanga, yabasabye kubyitondera.
Uretse ibi, aba batubuzi baba babwira abo baka amafaranga ko ari ayo gutera inkunga ibikorwa bye byo gufasha akora.
Ati “nta kindi uretse Zari uba asaba ubufasha bw’amafaranga, sintwara abantu mu mahanga kubashakira akazi. Abantu benshi baratuburiwe, ariko byose bingarukaho kuko isura yanjye ari yo ikoreshwa.”
Yasabye abakunzi be kwima amatwi aba bantu ndetse bakanababuloka(block).
Si ubwa mbere Zari ahuye n’iki kibazo, muri Werurwe 2021 nabwo yisanze mu kirego umuntu asaba ko amagarurira ibihumbi 55 by’amashilingi yari yatanze muri ubwo buryo, muri Nyakanga nabwo yaburiye abantu nyuma y’uko bamwe mu bamukurikira bavugaga ko batuburiwe.

Gatsibo: Abayobozi munzego z’ibanze barashishikarizwa kugeza gahunda ya “ndi umunyarwanda” kubo bashinzwe
Kuri uyu wa 22 Ugushyingo 2013, mu Karere ka Gatsibo hatangiye ibiganiro kuri gahunda ya “Ndi Umunyarwanda”, ibi biganiro bikaba byari bihuje abayobozi mu nzego z’ibanze, abayobozi b’amadini n’abahagarariye ibigo bitandukanye bikorera mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Muri ibi biganiro hagarutswe cyane ku mateka mabi yaranze igihugu cyacu ndetse akakigeza ku mahano ya jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994,
... 
nagaragajwe kandi uruhare runini rwagizwe n’abanyepolitiki mu gusenya ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda.
Mu kiganiro cyatanzwe na Gen. Rusagara, yagarutse ku isura mbi cyangwa nziza umuyobozi ashobora guha uwo ashinzwe kuyobora, ati:’’abo mushinzwe kuyobora bakurikiza ibyo mubabwiye, aho mubaganishije niho bagana’’.
Bamwe mu banyamabanga nshingwabikorwa twabasije kuganira nabo, bemeza ko gahunda ya ndi umunyarwanda izafasha abanyarwanda kurushaho kumva ko bari umwe, kandi ngo bakaba biteguye kubishishikari
...
abo bashinzwe kuyobora.
Muri ibi biganiro kandi, abayobozi mu zibanze bongeye kwibutswa umuco mwiza wo gusasa inzobe, uwumva aho yaba yarahemukiye mugenzi we kuko badahuje ubwoko akamusaba imbabazi, mu rwego rwo komorana ibikomere.
Ibi biganiro bitegurwa ku bufatanye na komisiyo y’igihugu y’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge (NURC) nk’urwego rufite inshingano yo guhuza ibikorwa biteza imbere ubumwe n’ubwiyunge, bikaba kandi umuyoboro mwiza wo gufatanya n’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu mu kubaka ubumwe n’ubwiyunjye.

Byatumye imikino yo gushaka itike yo kujya mu Gikombe cya Afurika cya 2025, itagomba kuhabera ahubwo iki gihugu kigomba gushaka ahandi cyajya cyakirira.
Kugeza ubu Ishyirahamwe rya Ruhago muri Kenya (FKF) ryagiranye ibiganiro n’iryo muri Uganda (FUFA) kugira ngo ritizwe ikibuga cyaberaho imikino iteganyijwe muri Nzeri 2024.
Iki ni igihombo gikomeye cyane kuri Harambee Stars ifite imikino ikomeye irimo uwa Cameroun iheruka gutwara Igikombe cya Afurika yagombaga kubona abafana benshi bayishyigikira iwayo.
Kenya izahura na Zimbabwe mu mukino uteganyijwe ku wa 4 Nzeri, ihite ijya gusura Namibia ku ya 10 Nzeri 2024.

MINICOM isanga ibigo biciriritse byaba igisubizo ku bushomeri

Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (MINICOM), Munyeshyaka Vincent, avuga ko mu rwego rwo gukomeza gushakisha igisubizo kirambye k’ikibazo cy’ubushomeri hakwifashishwa ibigo by’imari iciriritse kuko biramutse bibaye byinshi byatanga akazi kenshi.
Ibyo minisitiri Munyeshyaka yabigarutseho ubwo yatangizaga inama y’iminsi itatu ihuza ibigo by’imari biciriritse n’amabanki muri Afurika ikaba yari ihuje ba rwiyemezamirimo ba

ite ibigo biciriritse bitabiriye iyi nama mpuzamahanga n’ibigo by’imari bazashobora kubonana n’amabanki bakaba batangira gukorana bityo bagakomeza gufasha mu gutanga akazi mu rwego rwo gukomeza guhangana n’ubushomeri.
Ati “Amabanki ari buhure n’abantu bafite ibitekerezo bitandukanye by’imishinga kugira ngo barebe niba hari agashya bafite kugira ngo babe babaha amafaranga, turizera rero y’uko rwose Abanyarwanda cyangwa n’ibigo biri mu Rwanda bamwe bashobora kuza kugira icyo bumvikanaho n’abatanga

ngiza babanza gukora muri bene ibyo bigo ariko ubu bafite akazi keza, iyo ukora ahantu nk’aho uba urimo kwiyungura ubumenyi ku buryo babona igitekerezo cyo kwishingira umushinga, uba uri kumenyana n’abantu benshi, ikindi kandi uba uri no kuhakura amafaranga akubeshaho utagiye kwiyandarika.”
Nk’uko byagaragajwe muri iyo nama, ibigo biciriritse byihariye hejuru ya 90 % by’urwego rw’abikorera mu Rwanda naho mu kazi kangana na 94 % n’urwo rwego, ibigo biciriritse byihariye 41 %.

Umuntu wese wanga mwene Se ni umwicanyi, kandi muzi yuko ari nta mwicanyi ufite ubugingo buhoraho muri we. Iki ni cyo kitumenyesha urukundo icyo ari cyo, ni uko Yesu yatanze ubugingo bwe ku bwacu, natwe ikidukwiriye ni uko twatanga ubugingo bwacu ku bwa bene Data (1 Yohana 3:14-16).
Ni umuhamagaro wacu guhindura isi yacu dukoresheje ubuntu n’ubwiza bya Kristo. Ugomba kwerekana ubwiza bwe ahant
... 
4:8 & 16), kandi kugaragaza urukundo Rwayo ni umwe mu mirimo y’Umukristo; bigushyira mu mwanya wihariye nk’umwigishwa nyakuri wa Yesu Kristo: “Ibyo ni byo bose bazabamenyeraho ko muri abigishwa banjye, nimukundana” (Yohana 13:35).
Urukundo rwa Yesu werekana nta gitangira rukwiye kuba ari cyo cya mbere abantu bakubonaho. Rukwiye kuba aricyo kintu cya mbere gikurura mu buzima bwawe. Urukundo rurubaka, rurazamura, ndetse rujyana ku yindi ntera. Reka urukundo ukunda abo Yesu yapfiriye rukomere, kand
...
ka babandi muhura basubizwemo imbaraga, bazamurwe, ndetse baterwe ishyaka n’amagambo yawe n’ibikorwa by’urukundo.
Bibiliya ivuga ko udakunda, atazi Imana; ko aguma mu rupfu, urupfu rw’umwuka: “… Udakunda aguma mu rupfu‘‘ ( 1 Yohana 3:14). Ntabwo ukiri munsi y’urupfu rw’umwuka cyangwa imbaraga z’umwijima, kuko ukunda bene so. Ni ibisanzwe kuri wowe kugaragaza urukundo, no kubona ubwiza mu bandi ndetse no kunezererwa abo bari bo. Kunda cyane. Kunda iteka. Ni umuhamagaro wawe muri Kristo. Haleluya.

by http://www.urwego.com
Muraho neza bakunzi ba urwego.com; nifuje gutanga igitecyerezo cyanjye nagisha n’inama kuko hari byinshi ntasobanukirwa byerekeranye n’amabanga y’urugo.
Ndi umudamu ubyaye rimwe, mfite umwana w’imyaka itatu, nkaba maze imyaka ine mbana n’umugabo. Njya numva bavuga ngo abagore turarangiza ariko njyewe sinzi ngo bigenda bite.
Nagerageje no gufata nimero yabigishaga kuri radiyo ngo nzababaze, nkahamagara bikanga, ikindi kandi n’umugabo wanjye nta bucakura agira wenda na we ngo abe yasobanuza none ubu mfite amatsiko nabuze uwansobanurira.
Muri iki gihe abantu barahindutse ushobora kwizera umuntu ngo ugiye kumugisha inama akaba yasubira inyuma akansenyera, niyo mpamvu nanga kugira uwo mbaza mu baturanyi cyangwa abo nita inshuti zanjye.
Mungire inama kuko nabonye hano aribwo buryo bunyoroheye kugirango ngire byinshi menya, ese iyo umugore arangije azana amasohoro nk’ay’umugabo? Murakoze nzajya nkomeza ndebe ahagenewe ibitekerezo (Comments) ndebaho inama mwangiriye.
Imana ibahe umugisha bakunzi ba urwego.com kandi ntimunseke n’ubwo mutanzi kuko kubaza bitera kumenya, kimwe n’uko wasanga hari abo duhuje ikibazo. Nkore iki

Uri gusoma Daniyeli igice cya:

Mu ntara yitwa Nakuru, mu gihugu cya Kenya umugabo waruzwi ku izina rya Ochieng w’imyaka 35 yahisemo kurangiza ubuzima bwe ku cyumweru, tariki ya 20 Kamena 2021 ubwo isi yizihizaga umunsi mwiza waba Papa.
Umurambo we wabonetse mu nzu yaho yakodeshaga mu gace ka Rhonda.
Raporo y’abapolisi ivuga ko nyakwigendera yarangije ubuzima bwe akoresheje inzitiramubu yasanzwe iruhande rwe yashizemo umwuka. Umurambo wavumbuwe mbere n’uwitwa Winnie Wanjiru Mwaura wari umuturanyi wa nyakwigendera aho bombi bakodesheje.
Nyuma yo kubimenyesha abashinzwe umutekano, abashinzwe iperereza muri ako gace bahise basura aho byabereye.
Nk’uko abapolisi babitangaza, Nyakwigendera yarangije ubuzima bwe kubera ihohoterwa rikorerwa mu ngo ryabaye hagati ye n’umugore we batandukanye bari baramusize bikarangira yihebye kugeza aho yiyahuye.

Umugabo twaryamanye bwa mbere ntiyari uwanjye none uwanjye turabikora nkumva ntangerere ku ngingo nk’uwambere.
Ntarashaka umugabo naje kuryamana n’umugabo tugirana ibihe byiza, ariko kugeza n’ubu, nashatse umugabo numva atanshimisha nk’uwo wa mbere.
Umugabo twaryamanye bwa mbere twagiranye ibihe byiza
Mungire inama bakunzi ba urwego.com ko umugabo wanjye ntako aba atagize ngo andyohereze nakora iki ngo nibagirwe uwo mugabo twaryamanye bwa mbere.
Muri rusange umugabo wanjye ntazi ko hari umugabo twaryamanye mbere, ariko iyo ndebye uburyo igikorwa cyo gutera akabariro iyo kigeze numva ntishimiye n’uko mba mbyifuza.
Umutware wanjye we akora uko ashoboye kose ngo abashe kunshimisha ariko numva ntacyo amarira kuko hari n’igihe kigera nkumva najya gushaka wa mugabo twabonanye bwa mbere ngo numve ko nakongera kugira ibyishimo.
Mungire inama numve icyo nakora ngo mbashe kujya nyurwa n’umugabo wanjye nikuremo uwo twabonanye mbere, kandi ndashaka kubaka urugo rwanjye rugakomera ikibazo ni uko iyo tubikoze nsigarana irari nkumva najya gushakira ahandi". Nkore iki

Kuva kera numvaga bavuga ko ubutegetsi/abayobozi bitangwa n'Imana! Kuva icyo gihe sinigeze nsobanukira icyo iyo mvugo yabaga ishaka kuvuga. Byatumye nkomeza kubyibazaho, nitegereza amateka y'igihugu cyacu kuva ku bwa Gihanga kugeza ku bwa Gahini Kagame...
Mu minsi mike Paul Kagame azizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 20 ishize yarigaruriye u Rwanda. Azajya rero kuri Stade Amahoro yishongore, abanyarwanda bamukomere amashyi ariko abenshi bashirira imbere abandi bamuvumira ku gahera. Dore ikibazo abantu benshi bakomeje...

Bamwe mu batuye mu Murenge wa Kiziguro mu Karere ka Gatsibo, baravuga ko babangamiwe no kuba bamaze amezi asaga ane bategereje ingurane y’amasambu yabo ndetse n’imyaka yabo yangijwe.
Ayo masambu akarere kayahaye Abashinwa ngo bayaguriremo umuhanda Nyagatare-Kayonza.
Aba baturage basaga 20 bavuga ko mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka, ari bwo Akarere ka Gatsibo kaje kababwira ko mu masambu yabo hagenewe kubakwamo n’abashinwa bazasana umuhanda.
Ibishyimbo n’indi myaka yari iri muri ayo masambu byararanduwe
... 
a nasaze cyangwa nanapfuye, nk’ubu mfite umwana uzakora ikizamini gisoza umwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye, ejo bundi umuyobozi w’ikigo cy’amashuri cyabo yarampamagaye ambwira ko niba ntishyuye ibihumbi 18 atazemererwa kuzuza, icyo ni ikibazo kandi amafaranga nakabaye nyakura mu myaka yanjye barinduye ubu mba narasaruye.”
Mukamana Peruth, umubyeyi uvuga ko yatwawe isambu ye yose akaba asigaye aho atuye, we avuga ko kuri ubu iyo yabuze icyo ateka adashobora kugera mu rugo ku manywa, kugira ng
...
aka bari bafite, ariko bidatinze ikibazo kiri mu nzira zo gukemuka kubona ibyangombwa byarakoze hari ibyagiye mu rwego rushinzwe kwishyura.”
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko aba baturage bazaba bahawe ingurane bitarenze ibyumweru bibiri.
Uwishyuza amafaranga menshi yishyuza miliyoni 11, hakaba n’uwishyuza ibihumbi Magana atanu.
Ni kenshi hirya no hino hakunze kumvikana abaturage bakurwa mu byabo ku mpamvu z’inyungu rusange, bagasaba ko bajya bahabwa ingurane mbere, nk’uko itegeko ribiteganya.

Agira ati “Ibanga ryo gutsinda, tubanza kuba tubishaka, hamwe n’abarimu. Tukumva twifuza ko umwana batuzaniye, ufite ubwenge, atagwa mu maboko yacu, ahubwo twamufasha kugera kure hashoboka, dukurikije ubumenyi afite. Ibyo bituruka ku nama nyinshi dukorana n’abarimu, n’abanyeshuri.”

Iterabwoba si ikibazo kireba igihugu kimwe, ni ik’isi yose– Evode
Yanditswe na TWAGIRA WILSON
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubutabera ushinzwe Itegeko nshinga n’andi mategeko, Uwizeyimana Evode, asanga iterabwoba atari ikibazo kireba imipaka cyangwa igihugu kimwe, kuko ngo ari ikibazo kireba isi yose.
Uwizeyimana Evode yabivugiye mu Nteko ishinga amategeko ejo hashize tariki ya 3 Mutarama 2017 aho yari ahagarariye Guverinoma, mu nama yahuje Komisiyo y’abadepite bashinzwe ububanyi n’ama
... 
ura Zeno kimwe n’abandi badepite barimo Depite Rwabyoma, bavuga ko mu rwego rwo guca intege abashobora kwishora muri ibyo bikorwa by’iterabwoba bashyigikiye iyo ngingo.
Ni umushinga w’amategeko agizwe n’ingingo 50, aho zimwe muri izo ngingo zigaragaza umwihariko urebana no gukurikirana no guhana ukekwaho iterabwoba, zirimo gufata urikekwaho bitarinze gusaba inyandiko yo kumufata.
Uwizeyinama Evode yagarutse ku ngero ziganisha ku gushyigikira iyo ngingo ati “Nk’ubu nta bwo umuntu yaba afite amaku
...
 abandi ari iminsi 5, Maj. Kabandana John, umwe mu bakurikiranye umushinga w’iri tegeko, yabwiye abadepite ko iyo minsi nta kibazo ifite kuko asanga ari igihe gihagije cyafasha abantu kuba bakusanyije amakuru y’ibanze yafasha mu iperereza ku bantu bose bashobora kuba bafte ubufatanyacyaha mu gikorwa k’iterabwoba ku buryo ibikenerwa byinshi bisaba icukumbura. Ati “Iterabwoba ni icyaha kidasanzwe, na cyo kigomba guhagurukirwa kikarwanywa mu buryo budasanzwe.”
